name: Decision Assumption Template
description: Template for writing decision assumptions. Assumptions should be factual, testable, and specific to the decision context.

examples.output: Dry season (June-October) offers more predictable wildlife viewing with less vegetation.
Park fees in Tanzania are fixed costs that cannot be negotiated or avoided.
Shared vehicle safaris reduce per-person costs but limit flexibility on timing and routes.
Most safari destinations in East Africa carry year-round malaria transmission risk.
